innhold.avsnitt: You may only apply for parental benefit when the child has been born.
You may start your parental benefit period from the seventh week after the birth. If you start your benefit period later, you get fewer weeks of parental benefit unless you apply for a postponement.

To apply, log in using your BankID system from your bank or another approved electronic ID. The questions asked in the application are adapted to your situation, and instructions and information are provided as you fill in the form.
